expense_allowances.title: Meal Allowance
expense_allowances.hint: Payable when required to work overtime for at least 1.5 hours

expense_allowances.title: Compensation for Clothes and Tools
expense_allowances.hint: Compensation for damage or loss of employee's clothes, spectacles, hearing aids or tools

notes: Applies to loss by fire, breaking and entering while securely stored
Applies to loss during transport at employer's direction
Applies to accidental loss over water
Employee must report theft to police
Tools must be used in course of employment

special_provisions: Acid damage to clothes/equipment to be compensated as agreed
Employer to pay for toughened glass lenses when required

options.title: None
options.hint: No first aid responsibilities

options.hint: For employees with basic first aid qualifications

options.title: First Aid - Advanced Qualifications
options.hint: For employees with advanced first aid qualifications

multistorey_allowance.title: Multistorey Allowance
multistorey_allowance.hint: Additional allowance for working on multistorey buildings

options.title: Underground Allowance - Full Week

options.title: Underground Allowance - Partial Week
